question: The "Damajaqua Cascades" is located in which country?
explanation: Damajaqua Cascades is a complex of "27 Waterfalls" located along the Damajaqua River in the Puerto Plata city in the island country of the Dominican Republic in the Hispaniola Islands of the Great Antilles Archipelago in the West Indies-Caribbean region. This waterfall has been setup as a national monument for tourists to canyon through. The La Tinajita is one of the exciting waterfalls of the Damajaqua Cascades.
